item.title: Diving Into the World of Deep Learning
item.description: As a computer science undergraduate, I have always been fascinated by the power of machine learning to solve complex problems. Recently, I have become particularly interested in deep learning and its ability to achieve state-of-the-art results on various tasks, such as image and language processing. That’s why I am excited to announce that I am starting the “Practical Deep Learning for Coders” course from fast.ai, teached by Jeremy Howard. Through this course, I hope to gain a deeper understanding of deep learning and how to apply it in practice.
